text: @GeraldoRivera @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden Geraldo,you’re out of your mind...Joe Blow can’t finish complete sentences...POTUS has enacted bans on travel & closed borders, it’s the responsible thing to do...has anyone on the Left blamed Communist China & Xi for lying, NO...Impeachment was the focus Jan-Feb, not WuhanVirus!
